title: Big data value ecosystem
abstract: The mission of BDVe is to support the Big Data Value PPP in realizing a vibrant data-driven EU economy or said in other words, BDVe will support the implementation of the PPP to be a SUCCESS. Behind that mission, there are multiple goals to achieve, which should be taken into full consideration when defining the directions of the PPP. Some of the most challenging ones are: (1) achieving a more competitive landscape of European Big Data providers, leading to bigger market share; (2) creating the context for a more competitive EU industry (transport, manufacturing, public sector, agrifood, media, energy…) in the advent of a data-driven revolution where many traditional players will have to transform their processes and re-think their business if they want to remain completive –or in some cases, just to survive-; (3) ensuring the sustainability of the investments and actions triggered by the PPP. BDVe has broken down those high-level goals into 7 major priorities for the project: • Being accurately informed about most important facts in Big Data so that we have a solid basis to support the decision-making process in the PPP • Supporting the implementation of the Big Data PPP from an operational point of view • Developing a vibrant community around the PPP • Supporting the development of a European network of infrastructures and centers of excellence around Big Data • Setting-up a professional Communications strategy • Setting up a framework that supports the acceleration of data-driven businesses, and • Ensuring the sustainability of the investments and actions triggered by the PPP. The BDVe consortium includes a set of partners that have shown commitment and dedication to the success of the PPP for several years. They have already invested and they have committed to invest along the coming years. We believe that this CSA cannot be a neutral action that offers operational support without further commitment.

motivations: The EU economy needs support in becoming more data-driven to remain competitive in the global market.
European Big Data providers face challenges in achieving a larger market share and competitiveness.
Traditional industries in the EU need to transform their processes to survive in a data-driven revolution.
objectives: Support the implementation of the Big Data Value PPP to achieve a vibrant data-driven EU economy.
Create a more competitive landscape for European Big Data providers and EU industries.
Ensure the sustainability of investments and actions triggered by the PPP.
methods: Develop a solid basis for decision-making by gathering accurate information on Big Data.
Support the operational implementation of the Big Data PPP and develop a vibrant community around it.
Establish a European network of infrastructures and centers of excellence for Big Data.
results: Enhance the competitiveness of European Big Data providers and EU industries.
Support the transformation of traditional industries in the EU to become more data-driven.
Ensure the long-term sustainability of the Big Data Value PPP.
llama_json.research_subject: Big Data Value Ecosystem for a data-driven EU economy

motivations: There is a need to support the Big Data Value PPP in realizing a data-driven EU economy.
The current landscape requires a more competitive European Big Data providers, leading to a larger market share.
The advent of a data-driven revolution necessitates the transformation of traditional players in various industries.
objectives: Support the implementation of the Big Data PPP from an operational perspective.
Develop a vibrant community around the PPP.
Establish a European network of infrastructures and centers of excellence around Big Data.
methods: Provide accurate information about important facts in Big Data to support decision-making in the PPP.
Set up a framework that supports the acceleration of data-driven businesses.
results: Achieve a more competitive landscape of European Big Data providers.
Support the transformation of traditional industries in the face of a data-driven revolution.
Ensure the sustainability of the investments and actions triggered by the PPP.
openai_json.research_subject: Supporting and enhancing the Big Data Value PPP for a data-driven EU economy

motivations: European Big Data providers need to become more competitive to increase their market share in the global data-driven economy.
Traditional EU industries must transform their processes and business models to remain competitive in the data-driven revolution.
There is a need to ensure the sustainability of investments and actions triggered by the Big Data Value PPP.
objectives: Support the Big Data Value PPP in creating a vibrant data-driven EU economy and ensure its successful implementation.
Develop a European network of infrastructures and centers of excellence around Big Data while building a vibrant community around the PPP.
Establish frameworks for accelerating data-driven businesses and ensuring the sustainability of PPP investments.
methods: Gather and analyze important facts about Big Data to support informed decision-making in the PPP.
Implement operational support mechanisms and professional communication strategies for the PPP.
Create frameworks and networks that facilitate the acceleration of data-driven businesses and centers of excellence.
results: Increased competitiveness and market share of European Big Data providers in the global market.
Successful transformation of traditional EU industries to thrive in the data-driven economy.
Establishment of sustainable investments, vibrant communities, and infrastructure networks supporting Big Data innovation.
anthropic_json.research_subject: Supporting the Big Data Value PPP ecosystem for a competitive data-driven European economy
